lead_paragraph: The study, led by researchers at the University of Southern California, looked at places with high concentrations of fine particulate matter — the kind common in air pollution across China.
snippet: The study, led by researchers at the University of Southern California, looked at places with high concentrations of fine particulate matter — the kind common in air pollution across China....

headline.main: Pollution Leads to Greater Risk of Dementia Among Older Women, Study Says
